sources.title: Bowery At Midnight (1942) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: Bowery At Midnight is a 1942 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: Bowery at Midnight (1942)
sources.description: A seemingly charitable soup kitchen operator (who moonlights as a criminology professor) uses his Bowery mission as a front for his criminal gang. Police attempt to close in on the gang as they commit a series of robberies, murders and bizarre experiments on corpses. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/bowery-at-midnight-1942/

sources.title: Bowery at Midnight
sources.description: Bela Lugosi. By day, professor of psychology. By night, proprietor of a soup-kitchen that serves as the base for his criminal activities. Tom Neal of "Detour" fame also appears. "How often have I told you to keep that cat from desecrating my graves!"

sources.title: Bowery at Midnight (1942) BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, John Archer, Wanda McKay
Director: Wallace Fox

Kindly soup kitchen operator and professor of criminology Bela Lugosi uses his soup kitchen as a front for a criminal gang who commit a series of daring robberies and murders.

sources.title: Bowery at Midnight (1942; smallest download)
sources.description: Actors: Bela Lugosi; Wanda McKay; Dave O'Brien; Tom Neal; John Archer; Vince Barnett; Lew Kelly; J. Farrell MacDonald Runtime: 1:01:35

metadata.Plot: Kindly soup kitchen operator and professor of criminology Karl Wagner uses his soup kitchen as a front for a criminal gang who commit a series of daring robberies and murders. When things get out of hand, Wagner kills his henchmen, who wind up as zombies in the cellar of the soup kitchen.
metadata.Actors: Bela Lugosi, John Archer, Wanda McKay
